header: Tyre Thinks It Is Like a God

verse: The word of the Lord came to me. He said,
“Son of man, say to the ruler of Tyre, ‘This is what the Lord God says:
The word of the Lord came to me. He said,
“Son of man, sing this sad song about the king of Tyre. Say to him, ‘This is what the Lord God says:
The word of the Lord came to me. He said,
“Son of man, look toward Sidon and speak for me against that place.
Say, ‘This is what the Lord God says:

header: The Nations Will Stop Laughing at Israel

verse: “‘Then the surrounding nations that hate Israel will no longer be like stinging nettles and painful thorns. And they will know that I am the Lord God.’”

This is what the Lord God said: “I scattered the people of Israel among other nations, but I will gather the family of Israel together again. Then the nations will know that I am holy, and they will treat me that way. At that time the people of Israel will live in their land—I gave that land to my servant Jacob.

They will live safely in the land. They will build houses and plant vineyards. I will punish the nations around them that hated them. Then the people of Israel will live in safety, and they will know that I am the Lord their God.”
